item.title: Congress to tackle Epstein files controversy as it returns from recess
item.description: Legislative efforts continue to force the release of the Epstein files.

item.title: Trump administration use of National Guard in L.A. violated law, judge rules
item.description: The judge sharply reprimanded the Trump administration for its use of troops during immigration actions. He also stayed his ruling until next week.

item.title: Trump amps up rhetoric toward Chicago as Democrats prepare for showdown
item.description: The president has not detailed any plans for Chicago yet but has said it would be “probably next” after he sent the National Guard to Washington.

item.title: Eighty years after WWII’s end, the consensus it forged is crumbling
item.description: On Sept. 2, 1945, Japan surrendered, launching an era of alliances and trade. Now, with memories of the war fading, so is the consensus on how to avoi...

item.title: Congress returns with not much time to dodge a government shutdown
item.description: Lawmakers haven’t settled on a plan to pass spending legislation. The GOP will need to find Democratic votes in the Senate.
